hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Zora Scale# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ GS Skull On Fire

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Huge Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Larvae Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottle#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Fish Bottle#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ GS Flame Maze Side Room

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the back of the #basement of the Great Deku Tree# two spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Map of the Water Temple#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ GS Basement Graves Room
Deku Tree MQ GS Basement Back Room

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Map of the Ice Cavern# and #the Kokiri Sword#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Are you sure you want to play this? Wanna go get some tacos or something?

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
